html: As my Uncle Mo used to say, it’s a real estate fire sale without the fire, and it’s time for this sweetheart deal to come to an end. I’m going to be re-introducing common-sense legislation to update the law, because after 147 years, it could use some fixes.
text: As my Uncle Mo used to say, it’s a real estate fire sale without the fire, and it’s time for this sweetheart deal to come to an end. I’m going to be re-introducing common-sense legislation to update the law, because after 147 years, it could use some fixes.

html: A lot has changed since 1872—so why haven’t our mining laws? The Mining Act of 1872 is giving away minerals like gold and silver for FREE to corporations, and hurting our public lands by leaving thousands of abandoned mines polluting western water.https://www.postbulletin.com/opinion/other_views/commentary-stop-ripping-up-land-like-it-s/article_5623e346-8816-5e00-bdeb-8f7565afd2e4.html …

html: NM has been hit hard by the devastating impacts of climate change, and a new report (https://bit.ly/2WdFKNp ) shows we are the second fastest warming state in the nation— and our very own Las Cruces is the 10th fastest warming city. We must act to save our state and our planet.
text:
NM has been hit hard by the devastating impacts of climate change, and a new report (https://bit.ly/2WdFKNp ) shows we are the second fastest warming state in the nation— and our very own Las Cruces is the 10th fastest warming city.
 
We must act to save our state and our planet.

html: 6 months after the Pittsburgh Synagogue shooting, we are grappling with yet another act of hate against Jewish worshippers— on the final day of Passover. Jill and I are thinking about the victims & their loved ones. We cannot accept such senseless gun violence as the status quo.

html: Manuel Luján Jr. was a true public servant and a trailblazing leader for Hispanics. He was steadfast and unwavering in his service to the people of New Mexico and our way of life. Jill and I are thinking of his family and loved ones at this sad time.

html: Now he has been confirmed, Mr. Bernhardt would be wise to heed concerns raised about his nomination, take concrete actions to avoid conflicts of interest, and prioritize public interest in his decision-making as a steward of America’s public lands & waters from this day forward.

html: After careful consideration of David Bernhardt’s record, I voted NO on his nomination. The people deserve an @Interior Sec they can trust to look out for their interests: protecting public land, species, and air & water. But his conflicts of interest cloud his ability to do so.
text:
After careful consideration of David Bernhardt’s record, I voted NO on his nomination.
 
The people deserve an @Interior Sec they can trust to look out for their interests: protecting public land, species, and air & water. But his conflicts of interest cloud his ability to do so.

html: I’m co-sponsoring the #WorkingFamilies Tax Relief Act because it would boost the incomes of more than 800,000 New Mexicans. It’s time for Congress to actually make tax reforms that benefit the people who need them: hardworking, everyday Americans.

html: #LunchShaming is a practice so backwards & cruel that most Americans would be shocked to know it happens. But it does. And we need to end it. I was proud when New Mexico became the first state to outlaw the practice, and I'll keep fighting to pass this legislation in Congress.
text:
#LunchShaming is a practice so backwards & cruel that most Americans would be shocked to know it happens. But it does. And we need to end it.

I was proud when New Mexico became the first state to outlaw the practice, and I'll keep fighting to pass this legislation in Congress.

html: #LunchShaming is the cruel practice of stigmatizing children who can't pay for school lunch. These awful tactics have no place in our schools. Instead, we should work to end child hunger & support families in need. So today, @RepDebHaaland & I intro'd the Anti-Lunch Shaming Act.https://twitter.com/attn/status/910884596702625792 …
text:
#LunchShaming is the cruel practice of stigmatizing children who can't pay for school lunch.

html: I asked leaders at @DeptofDefense if they support critical military construction projects in NM & around the country. They all said yes. html: We're introducing legislation to protect NM's treasured #Chaco landscape. Chaco is an international treasure, sacred to Tribes & rich with history. But it’s threatened by expanded oil & gas development— we’ve worked hard on a bill to safeguard this special place. #ProtectChacopic.twitter.com/nnrakydK1K
text:
We're introducing legislation to protect NM's treasured #Chaco landscape.

Chaco is an international treasure, sacred to Tribes & rich with history. But it’s threatened by expanded oil & gas development— we’ve worked hard on a bill to safeguard this special place. #ProtectChacopic.twitter.com/nnrakydK1K

html: 51 years ago today, Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr. was killed. One of our nation’s greatest leaders was taken from us far too soon, but his legacy will always live on—in the enduring change he secured, and the generations of activists and leaders he has inspired.

html: The overall pay gap in New Mexico is 85 cents on the dollar, for Native women it’s 52, and for Latina women it’s 56. I’m fighting hard to close the wage gap and co-sponsoring the #PaycheckFairness Act. It’s time to make real progress on #FairPay.
text:
The overall pay gap in New Mexico is 85 cents on the dollar, for Native women it’s 52, and for Latina women it’s 56.

I’m fighting hard to close the wage gap and co-sponsoring the #PaycheckFairness Act. It’s time to make real progress on #FairPay.

html: Today is #EqualPayDay. Why today? Because it’s taken from Jan 2018 to today for women, on average, to have earned the same amount that men did in 2018. That's unacceptable—and for many women of color, the #paygap is even worse.pic.twitter.com/IYYN806LcC
text: Today is #EqualPayDay. Why today? Because it’s taken from Jan 2018 to today for women, on average, to have earned the same amount that men did in 2018. That's unacceptable—and for many women of color, the #paygap is even worse.pic.twitter.com/IYYN806LcC

html: Today is #CensusDay— a year from the start of the #2020Census, a key tool for deciding how federal funds are distributed around the country. I'm fighting to make sure all New Mexicans get counted, because areas most vulnerable to an undercount are those most in need of resources.

This is a wasteful & ineffective wall, and money shouldn't be raided from the military to fund it.

text:
Today, the Senate will take a historic vote to terminate the president's national emergency declaration.

This is the day for all senators to stand up for our Constitution and our oath of office.

html: I voted YES on the resolution to end US support for the disastrous Saudi-led war in Yemen. It is not in our national security interest & the Saudi campaign has targeted innocent civilians & children. Congress stood up to assert our constitutional oversight duties over this war.
text:
I voted YES on the resolution to end US support for the disastrous Saudi-led war in Yemen. It is not in our national security interest & the Saudi campaign has targeted innocent civilians & children. 

Congress stood up to assert our constitutional oversight duties over this war.

html: As a border state senator, I oppose @POTUS' border wall. But this isn’t about where you stand on the wall, or what party you come from. This is about whether we'll let any president blatantly grab for power and go around Congress to spend taxpayer money at will on a pet project.
text: As a border state senator, I oppose @POTUS' border wall. But this isn’t about where you stand on the wall, or what party you come from. This is about whether we'll let any president blatantly grab for power and go around Congress to spend taxpayer money at will on a pet project.

html: No senator can claim to protect the Constitution or the separation of powers if they vote to allow this power grab. Symbolic measures that would allow @POTUS to violate the Constitution this time around are not sufficient.
text:
No senator can claim to protect the Constitution or the separation of powers if they vote to allow this power grab.
 
Symbolic measures that would allow @POTUS to violate the Constitution this time around are not sufficient.

html: Two weeks ago, I went to the Senate floor to introduce a bipartisan resolution to terminate the president's emergency declaration. Soon, the Senate will vote on an identical resolution. Every senator–no matter their party–must vote to defend our Constitution.pic.twitter.com/NBYOJRMnFU
text:
Two weeks ago, I went to the Senate floor to introduce a bipartisan resolution to terminate the president's emergency declaration.
 
Soon, the Senate will vote on an identical resolution.
 
Every senator–no matter their party–must vote to defend our Constitution.pic.twitter.com/NBYOJRMnFU

html: Horrified to see the destruction in SE NM in the wake of yesterday’s tornadoes — my thoughts are with all those affected or injured in Dexter & Hagerman. Huge thanks to the first responders, and I will do all I can to help communities, dairy producers, and families recover.
text: Horrified to see the destruction in SE NM in the wake of yesterday’s tornadoes — my thoughts are with all those affected or injured in Dexter & Hagerman. Huge thanks to the first responders, and I will do all I can to help communities, dairy producers, and families recover.

html: .@POTUS needs to finally appoint a permanent leader for FAA. An agency with such a critical safety mission should not have its top office be "acting" for over 14 months. Without real leadership & oversight at FAA, we are ceding our role on aviation safety to other nations.
text:
.@POTUS needs to finally appoint a permanent leader for FAA. An agency with such a critical safety mission should not have its top office be "acting" for over 14 months. 
 
Without real leadership & oversight at FAA, we are ceding our role on aviation safety to other nations.

html: Any Senate hearing on FAA issues should also cover issues surrounding CFM56 engines -- like the one that brought down the Southwest Airlines flight in April and resulted in the death of one of my New Mexico constituents, Jennifer Riordan.
text: Any Senate hearing on FAA issues should also cover issues surrounding CFM56 engines -- like the one that brought down the Southwest Airlines flight in April and resulted in the death of one of my New Mexico constituents, Jennifer Riordan.

html: The Senate Commerce Committee must hold a hearing on the Boeing 737 Max 8, and on other key air safety concerns, like engines. FAA should either take precautionary measures to temporarily ground these planes, or explain on camera to the American flying public why they aren't.
text:
The Senate Commerce Committee must hold a hearing on the Boeing 737 Max 8, and on other key air safety concerns, like engines.
 
FAA should either take precautionary measures to temporarily ground these planes, or explain on camera to the American flying public why they aren't.

html: We're introducing the MAR-A-LAGO Act to require disclosure of visitor logs at the WH & Trump properties. You shouldn't get special influence over the president just because you're a regular at his club. And the American people deserve to know who has access to their government.pic.twitter.com/6LVJdby8R1
text:
We're introducing the MAR-A-LAGO Act to require disclosure of visitor logs at the WH & Trump properties.
 
You shouldn't get special influence over the president just because you're a regular at his club. And the American people deserve to know who has access to their government.pic.twitter.com/6LVJdby8R1

html: I'm proud to once again introduce legislation to put Wi-Fi on school buses. Nearly a third of #NM students are at risk of falling behind in school, simply because they can't get on the internet at home. We need to end the "homework gap," and make sure every student can succeed.
text:
I'm proud to once again introduce legislation to put Wi-Fi on school buses.
 
Nearly a third of #NM students are at risk of falling behind in school, simply because they can't get on the internet at home. We need to end the "homework gap," and make sure every student can succeed.

html: .@POTUS' budget is a reflection of his admin's backwards priorities. It would devastate our economy & it targets hardworking families in NM & across the U.S. I'll work hard with my colleagues on a strong, bipartisan budget that invests in New Mexico & moves the country forward.
text:
.@POTUS' budget is a reflection of his admin's backwards priorities. It would devastate our economy & it targets hardworking families in NM & across the U.S.
 
I'll work hard with my colleagues on a strong, bipartisan budget that invests in New Mexico & moves the country forward.

html: Today is #InternationalWomensDay, a chance to celebrate women around the world and of course, right here at home. So often, the work and contributions of Native women go overlooked. We should honor them each and every day, and today I want to highlight some of the reasons why.
text:
Today is #InternationalWomensDay, a chance to celebrate women around the world and of course, right here at home.
 
So often, the work and contributions of Native women go overlooked. We should honor them each and every day, and today I want to highlight some of the reasons why.

html: I urge my colleagues on both sides of the aisle to put aside cynical politics and work on common sense legislation that will uproot corruption and strengthen our democracy. Democracy is supposed to be #ForThePeople— and that’s who we’re giving it back to.
text: I urge my colleagues on both sides of the aisle to put aside cynical politics and work on common sense legislation that will uproot corruption and strengthen our democracy. Democracy is supposed to be #ForThePeople— and that’s who we’re giving it back to.

html: Historic news: the U.S. House just passed #HR1, taking a major step toward taking control of our government out of the hands of big money and special interests—and returning it to the people. I'm excited to introduce our companion bill soon and push to pass it in the Senate.
text:
Historic news: the U.S. House just passed #HR1, taking a major step toward taking control of our government out of the hands of big money and special interests—and returning it to the people.
 
I'm excited to introduce our companion bill soon and push to pass it in the Senate.

html: Real people are getting hurt. Just ask student borrowers in New Mexico, which has the 2nd highest student loan default rate in the country. Our bill is badly needed to protect these borrowers, and restore the independence and effectiveness of the CFPB's student loan watchdog.
text:
Real people are getting hurt. Just ask student borrowers in New Mexico, which has the 2nd highest student loan default rate in the country. 
 
Our bill is badly needed to protect these borrowers, and restore the independence and effectiveness of the CFPB's student loan watchdog.

html: Today, I’m introducing bipartisan legislation with @RandPaul to end the war in Afghanistan. Congress needs to exert its authority to bring our brave troops home after a job well done. A never-ending war is not in our national interests.

html: The Senate must pass our resolution to terminate the president's national emergency declaration. I encourage more Republicans to stand up & show the American people where they stand on this issue. No president should be able to go around Congress & spend taxpayer money at will.

The Senate must pass our resolution to terminate the president's national emergency declaration. I encourage more Republicans to stand up & show the American people where they stand on this issue. 

No president should be able to go around Congress & spend taxpayer money at will.

html: This isn't just about understanding how many people live in our country. This is about making sure communities get all the resources they need to thrive, and that relies on an accurate count. We need to fund and support the 2020 census effort, and we need to work on this now.
text: This isn't just about understanding how many people live in our country. This is about making sure communities get all the resources they need to thrive, and that relies on an accurate count. We need to fund and support the 2020 census effort, and we need to work on this now.

html: 229 years our nation authorized the first census. Fast forward to today, and it has become one of our most important tools for determining how federal funds are distributed. I'm working hard to make sure every single New Mexican gets counted in the 2020 census.

html: When we were sworn into Congress, we didn’t swear an oath to one party or person. We swore an oath to uphold the Constitution. And that’s why we need to vote to end this emergency declaration.
text: When we were sworn into Congress, we didn’t swear an oath to one party or person. We swore an oath to uphold the Constitution. And that’s why we need to vote to end this emergency declaration.

html: This isn’t a political issue. The president's emergency declaration is testing whether we're going to lie down and set this dangerous precedent— where any president can raid taxpayer money without the consent of Congress. We can't go down that path.

html: Even the president doesn’t really think it’s an emergency. After all, he said it loud and clear: “I didn’t have to do this.” Unfortunately, he did. Now the ball is in Congress’ court. Are we still a co-equal branch? Let’s show it.
text:
Even the president doesn’t really think it’s an emergency. After all, he said it loud and clear: “I didn’t have to do this.” 

Unfortunately, he did.  Now the ball is in Congress’ court. Are we still a co-equal branch? Let’s show it.

html: The @EPA put out an "action plan" to address #PFAS contamination in drinking water, but it doesn’t include an actual drinking water standard for these dangerous chemicals— which it must. The EPA is delaying that decision for a year or more. New Mexicans can’t wait that long.
text:
The @EPA put out an "action plan" to address #PFAS contamination in drinking water, but it doesn’t include an actual drinking water standard for these dangerous chemicals— which it must.
 
The EPA is delaying that decision for a year or more.  New Mexicans can’t wait that long.

html: The #FamilyAct would guarantee paid leave, so New Mexicans could care for family members who might need it— newborns to grandparents. On top of that, it would boost our economy, cover & protect all working people & improve workplace equity. There’s no good reason not to pass it.
text: The #FamilyAct would guarantee paid leave, so New Mexicans could care for family members who might need it— newborns to grandparents. On top of that, it would boost our economy, cover & protect all working people & improve workplace equity. There’s no good reason not to pass it.

html: #PaidLeave would be a game-changer in New Mexico. 65% of NM households have two parents with paying jobs— that means they're often forced to choose between a paycheck and their families. That’s unacceptable. That’s why I’m cosponsoring the #FAMILYAct.pic.twitter.com/WVrnhhroMd
text:
#PaidLeave would be a game-changer in New Mexico. 65% of NM households have two parents with paying jobs— that means they're often forced to choose between a paycheck and their families. That’s unacceptable.
 
That’s why I’m cosponsoring the #FAMILYAct.pic.twitter.com/WVrnhhroMd

His administration will keep ignoring what the people actually want in order to give big money donors & lobbyists a leg up.

We must pass #ForThePeople legislation to fix our democracy and return it to the American people.

html: As a border state senator, I can tell you: most New Mexicans don’t want the president’s wall, because it could cause irreparable damage to our border & environment. @MartinHeinrich & I are standing up for our state with bills to protect NM's landowners, wildlife & way of life.

html: I hear from thousands of New Mexicans as I travel around the state. And they all want the same things – a livable wage. Accessible health care. A stronger state & brighter future for our children. Even when we disagree, we are all committed to these same goals. #UdallNMLeg

html: New Mexico’s four military bases all serve critical national security missions. And we have made sure those missions continue — I am committed to the expansion and success of our bases. #UdallNMLeg
text: New Mexico’s four military bases all serve critical national security missions. And we have made sure those missions continue — I am committed to the expansion and success of our bases. #UdallNMLeg

html: Our national laboratories & military bases keep our nation secure. They're a cornerstone of our economy & workforce. Los Alamos & Sandia are at record funding levels. And we want to make sure clean up at LANL goes forward. #UdallNMLeg
text: Our national laboratories & military bases keep our nation secure. They're a cornerstone of our economy & workforce. Los Alamos & Sandia are at record funding levels. And we want to make sure clean up at LANL goes forward. #UdallNMLeg

html: New Mexicans want and deserve quality health care, but not enough have it. Just as we have worked to defend the #ACA, we need to fight challenges in our health system. And we must fight the opioid epidemic ravaging NM. We need to end the scourge of opioid addiction. #UdallNMLeg

New Mexicans want and deserve quality health care, but not enough have it. Just as we have worked to defend the #ACA, we need to fight challenges in our health system.

html: As we work to vitalize our rural economy, we must think big. I am committed to closing the digital divide in rural NM & across the nation. That’s why I have worked on grants and legislation to secure rural and tribal broadband. #UdallNMLeg

html: As a senior member on @SenateApprops, I have a chance fight for funding that benefits our state.   One of my priorities is our rural economy. I've worked on legislation to increase resources for farmers & ranchers who are just getting started or looking to expand. #UdallNMLeg

html: NM feels climate change, and we need to fight drought and modernize water infrastructure. We can't meet 21st century challenges with 19th century infrastructure— so I've worked to nearly double the funding to rural water projects. #UdallNMLeg

html: I’ve been working for years on comprehensive reform for our democracy. My #ForThePeople Act will rein in our campaign finance system, end gerrymandering & set a high ethical bar for gov't officials. These measures are not red or blue. They are red, white, and blue. #UdallNMLeg

I’ve been working for years on comprehensive reform for our democracy. My #ForThePeople Act will rein in our campaign finance system, end gerrymandering & set a high ethical bar for gov't officials.

These measures are not red or blue.  They are red, white, and blue. #UdallNMLeg

html: Democracy depends on all citizens voting. Democracy depends on elected officials carrying out the people's will. Democracy depends on gov't officials working for the people, not their wallets. My #ForThePeople reform package will help return democracy to the people. #UdallNMLeg

Democracy depends on all citizens voting.
Democracy depends on elected officials carrying out the people's will.

html: The latest allegations against President Trump are astonishing. To get the full truth, we need to protect the Mueller investigation and Congress must continue its own with complete transparency. No one— not even the president of the United States— is above the law.
text:
The latest allegations against President Trump are astonishing.
 
To get the full truth, we need to protect the Mueller investigation and Congress must continue its own with complete transparency. No one— not even the president of the United States— is above the law.

html: Zachary Ornelas had a brain tumor, and has undergone two surgeries. He now needs constant care. His stepfather, Ervie, reduced his work by 75 percent to take care of Zachary. His mother, Leah's, paycheck goes to medical bills. His family moved back in together to save money.
text:
Zachary Ornelas had a brain tumor, and has undergone two surgeries. He now needs constant care.

His stepfather, Ervie, reduced his work by 75 percent to take care of Zachary.

His mother, Leah's, paycheck goes to medical bills.

His family moved back in together to save money.

html: It’s been six years since 20 innocent children were murdered at #SandyHook. On this tragic anniversary, my heart is with the loved ones of the children who lost their lives that day. If Congress wants to honor them, we must come together and act to end the violence.
text:
It’s been six years since 20 innocent children were murdered at #SandyHook. On this tragic anniversary, my heart is with the loved ones of the children who lost their lives that day.
 
If Congress wants to honor them, we must come together and act to end the violence.

html: On my way to vote YES on @SenSanders & @SenMikeLee’s resolution to END US support for the disastrous Saudi-led war in Yemen. We can't stay complicit in a war targeting innocent civilians & children. Our support for the Saudi war—and this horrific humanitarian crisis— must end.
text:
On my way to vote YES on @SenSanders & @SenMikeLee’s resolution to END US support for the disastrous Saudi-led war in Yemen.
 
We can't stay complicit in a war targeting innocent civilians & children. Our support for the Saudi war—and this horrific humanitarian crisis— must end.

html: This morning, I'm thinking about the victims of the Aztec HS shooting— one year ago today. It's been incredible to see the way Aztec made sure students & families have the support they need. New Mexico stands with your community, in awe of your strength over the last year.
text:
This morning, I'm thinking about the victims of the Aztec HS shooting— one year ago today.
 
It's been incredible to see the way Aztec made sure students & families have the support they need. New Mexico stands with your community, in awe of your strength over the last year.

Congress can do something about this: we need to pass our Stopping Grinch Bots Act.

html: .@SenatorHeitkamp put a lot of hard work into this bill, and it shows: it passed @IndianCommittee with unanimous support yesterday. I hope the full Congress can show that same solidarity and pass #SavannasAct as soon as possible. Native women's lives are at stake.
text:
.@SenatorHeitkamp put a lot of hard work into this bill, and it shows: it passed @IndianCommittee with unanimous support yesterday. I hope the full Congress can show that same solidarity and pass #SavannasAct as soon as possible.

Native women's lives are at stake.

html: This bill is named for Savanna LaFontaine-Greywind, who was abducted & murdered last year. She was 22, and 8 months pregnant. Hers is one of many similarly disturbing stories. We must end the crisis of missing and murdered Native women. Congress needs to pass Savanna's Act.
text:
This bill is named for Savanna LaFontaine-Greywind, who was abducted & murdered last year. She was 22, and 8 months pregnant. Hers is one of many similarly disturbing stories.
 
We must end the crisis of missing and murdered Native women. Congress needs to pass Savanna's Act.

html: Crimes against Native women often go uninvestigated. Something has to change, and #SavannasAct is a great first step. I'm a proud co-sponsor of this bill that will clarify guidelines for law enforcement responding to Missing & Murdered Indigenous Women.https://www.koat.com/article/member-of-laguna-pueblo-as-a-native-woman-it-gives-me-hope/25143312 …

Crimes against Native women often go uninvestigated. Something has to change, and #SavannasAct is a great first step.

html: Today, we all woke up to tragic news: another act of senseless gun violence. Our hearts are with the victims in Thousand Oaks, their families & the brave first responders who lost one of their own. We can't grow numb to gun violence. It can't be the status quo. We need to act.
text:
Today, we all woke up to tragic news: another act of senseless gun violence. Our hearts are with the victims in Thousand Oaks, their families & the brave first responders who lost one of their own.

We can't grow numb to gun violence. It can't be the status quo. We need to act.

html: Ending the pay gap for Hispanic women is a moral & economic imperative for #NM, where 100s of thousands of Hispanic women are working to put food on the table for their families. We can't accept a reality where Hispanic women are making 47% less than white men. #47PercentCounts
text:
Ending the pay gap for Hispanic women is a moral & economic imperative for #NM, where 100s of thousands of Hispanic women are working to put food on the table for their families.

We can't accept a reality where Hispanic women are making 47% less than white men. #47PercentCounts

html: It takes a Hispanic woman almost two years to make what a white man makes in one year. That’s unacceptable. On #LatinaEqualPayDay, we mark the 11 extra months Hispanic women must work to earn equal pay. We must close the pay gap for women across #NM and the US.pic.twitter.com/esmlctyj1u
text:
It takes a Hispanic woman almost two years to make what a white man makes in one year.
 
That’s unacceptable. On #LatinaEqualPayDay, we mark the 11 extra months Hispanic women must work to earn equal pay. We must close the pay gap for women across #NM and the US.pic.twitter.com/esmlctyj1u

html: Appalled by this act of violence & hatred inside a house of worship, where all deserve to feel safe. Jill & I send our deepest sympathies to all affected. We can't accept this senseless gun violence as the status quo. And our leaders must end the rhetoric of hate & division.
text:
Appalled by this act of violence & hatred inside a house of worship, where all deserve to feel safe. Jill & I send our deepest sympathies to all affected.

We can't accept this senseless gun violence as the status quo. And our leaders must end the rhetoric of hate & division.

html: Sat down with Cannon AFB leadership to discuss & get answers about how USAF will protect from and clean up possible water contamination from PFOS chemicals in the surrounding area. Later, I met with local community members to hear directly from them about this serious situation.

html: It was great to hear about the ways the #ACA and expanded Medicaid has helped rural hospitals & clinics here in eastern New Mexico. I’m focused on making sure rural communities have access to the health care resources they need—and these programs are an instrumental part of that.

@SwestCreations -- a women-driven, sustainable business -- is the perfect anchor tenant, helping alleviate poverty and expand access to education.

html: 1 in 4 girls experience sexual violence before turning 18. That’s why I’m taking the #GirlsToo pledge. Together we can create a culture of respect for all young people, so they can grow up in a world that values the rights of women & girls.

html: I'd say every day is National Farmers Day in #NM— but I’m excited we're all celebrating today. Farmers across #NM help feed & fuel the entire nation with chile, pecans, dairy & more. Seeing them in action inspires me to work for & support our entire agricultural community.pic.twitter.com/PeGbCiDrgd

html: The @USPS is the most popular federal agency we have. But @POTUS wants to privatize it. We should work to improve and modernize this outstanding service—not do away with it at the drop of the hat. That’s what the American people want.pic.twitter.com/D5V2fwH49u
text:
The @USPS is the most popular federal agency we have. But @POTUS wants to privatize it.

We should work to improve and modernize this outstanding service—not do away with it at the drop of the hat. That’s what the American people want.pic.twitter.com/D5V2fwH49u

html: #NM is in the bullseye of climate change, & we see firsthand how urgent this is. It's time for @POTUS & GOP Leaders to join most of America & the rest of the world to take action. We have the skills & ability to do it. Now we need the political will.
text:
#NM is in the bullseye of climate change, & we see firsthand how urgent this is.
  
It's time for @POTUS & GOP Leaders to join most of America & the rest of the world to take action. We have the skills & ability to do it. Now we need the political will.

html: Today, I joined @SenMarkey to sound the alarm on climate change. We need immediate action. We only have 12 years to slash greenhouse gas emissions in half. 12 years to prevent catastrophe. That’s the conclusion of 91 scientists from 40+ countries.pic.twitter.com/ZwYGHZeLra
text:
Today, I joined @SenMarkey to sound the alarm on climate change. We need immediate action. We only have 12 years to slash greenhouse gas emissions in half. 12 years to prevent catastrophe.
 
That’s the conclusion of 91 scientists from 40+ countries.pic.twitter.com/ZwYGHZeLra

html: To those angered & hurt by Kavanaugh’s confirmation, I hope you will continue to fight for the values that make this nation great. I will keep fighting – because as frustrated as I am, I am inspired by your courage, which I have witnessed firsthand over these trying weeks.
text: To those angered & hurt by Kavanaugh’s confirmation, I hope you will continue to fight for the values that make this nation great. I will keep fighting – because as frustrated as I am, I am inspired by your courage, which I have witnessed firsthand over these trying weeks.

html: The #SCOTUS fight divided the nation. To those in #NM who supported Kavanaugh: I know we can disagree without doubting our shared love of this country. I voted No because I believe Brett Kavanaugh did not prove himself worthy of a seat on #SCOTUS. I hope he proves me wrong.
text:
The #SCOTUS fight divided the nation.
 
To those in #NM who supported Kavanaugh: I know we can disagree without doubting our shared love of this country. I voted No because I believe Brett Kavanaugh did not prove himself worthy of a seat on #SCOTUS.
 
I hope he proves me wrong.

html: Before his nomination, Judge Kavanaugh showed a philosophy that sides with the powerful at the expense of working people across #NM. But what we learned about Judge Kavanaugh during this confirmation process may be an even greater reason to oppose him. I voted NO.
text:
Before his nomination, Judge Kavanaugh showed a philosophy that sides with the powerful at the expense of working people across #NM.
 
But what we learned about Judge Kavanaugh during this confirmation process may be an even greater reason to oppose him.
 
I voted NO.

html: In the wake of Dr. Christine Blasey Ford’s courageous testimony, survivors across #NM have reached out to tell me about their own experiences with sexual violence. With their permission, I’m sharing some of their incredible words with you.pic.twitter.com/5VwhzI14zH

html: The nation—and the world—will miss John’s fierce independence and his unwavering dedication to doing what is right — no matter the cost. Now more than ever, during these uncertain times, let us all strive to follow in Senator McCain’s footsteps and to rise to his heroic example.
text: The nation—and the world—will miss John’s fierce independence and his unwavering dedication to doing what is right — no matter the cost. Now more than ever, during these uncertain times, let us all strive to follow in Senator McCain’s footsteps and to rise to his heroic example.

html: It is a privilege to have known John McCain – to have served with him in the Senate, and to call him a dear friend. John’s fearlessness, his unyielding integrity, and his generosity of spirit truly touched the entire Udall family. We will miss him dearly.
text: It is a privilege to have known John McCain – to have served with him in the Senate, and to call him a dear friend. John’s fearlessness, his unyielding integrity, and his generosity of spirit truly touched the entire Udall family. We will miss him dearly.

html: The court ordered @POTUS to reunify children & parents a month ago. 565 kids, many younger than 5, are still separated from families. Our amendments support the well-being of children in #HHS custody, but @POTUS needs a plan to rectify this inhumanity now. #FamiliesBelongTogether

html: By ripping these families apart, @POTUS has inflicted unconscionable harm on innocent kids. The policy is completely un-American, and made worse by the fact that these kids are in unstable and potentially unsafe environments.

html: Today, the president's campaign chairman was convicted on 8 counts. The president's personal lawyer admitted--under oath--that @realDonaldTrump directed him to violate campaign finance laws. No amount of desperate spin from @POTUS can change those facts.
text:
Today, the president's campaign chairman was convicted on 8 counts. The president's personal lawyer admitted--under oath--that @realDonaldTrump directed him to violate campaign finance laws.

No amount of desperate spin from @POTUS can change those facts.

html: Last year, I introduced a bill to #BanChlorpyrifos--because the Trump EPA refused to act to protect children & farmworkers. And today, a federal court is telling the EPA that there was “no justification” for rejecting the science and keeping #chlorpyrifos on the market.
text: Last year, I introduced a bill to #BanChlorpyrifos--because the Trump EPA refused to act to protect children & farmworkers. And today, a federal court is telling the EPA that there was “no justification” for rejecting the science and keeping #chlorpyrifos on the market.

html: The Trump @EPA reversed the ban on #chlorpyrifos, a toxic pesticide linked to brain damage in kids. They put the profits of Dow Chemical ahead of the safety of our children. Now, a federal court is telling EPA it must #BanChlorpyrifos. This is a major victory for public health.https://twitter.com/thehill/status/1027584663274053632 …
text:
The Trump @EPA reversed the ban on #chlorpyrifos, a toxic pesticide linked to brain damage in kids. They put the profits of Dow Chemical ahead of the safety of our children.
 
Now, a federal court is telling EPA it must #BanChlorpyrifos. This is a major victory for public health.https://twitter.com/thehill/status/1027584663274053632 …

html: To this day, our work to carry on Miguel Trujillo's legacy--to ensure that every Native American and every American can exercise their right to vote--continues. Voter suppression efforts across the country are putting undemocratic barriers on the voting rights of millions.
text:
To this day, our work to carry on Miguel Trujillo's legacy--to ensure that every Native American and every American can exercise their right to vote--continues.
 
Voter suppression efforts across the country are putting undemocratic barriers on the voting rights of millions.

html: 70 years ago, a federal court affirmed the right of Native Americans to vote in New Mexico.
